Package client.Controllers

Class ChatPageController

java.lang.Object
client.Controllers.mainPage
client.Controllers.ChatPageController
public class ChatPageController
extends mainPage
this class loads the page of a user chatting with another user.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class client.Controllers.mainPage

    root, scene, stage

    Constructors

    ChatPageController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void attach​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    this method is for sending a picMessage to the server.
    void goBack​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    this method returns the user to the direct menu
    void initialize()
    this method is called before all other methods and loads the chats which occurred in the past.
    void refresh​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    this method refreshes the chat page so that the new chats can be seen.
    void send​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    this method sends a new message for the other user he / she is chatting with.
